title: IRSA releases 462,700 cusecs water
content:
ISLAMABAD, Aug 04 (APP):Indus River System Authority (IRSA) onÂ  Sunday released 4627600 cusecs water from various rim stations with inflow of 53,800 cusecs.
According to the data released by IRSA, water level in River Indus at Tarbela Dam was 1533.00 feet and was 135.00 feet higher than its dead level of 1,398 feet. Water inflow and outflow in the dam was recorded as 331,000 cusecs and 275,500 cusecs respectively.
The water level in River Jhelum at Mangla Dam was 1204.40 feet, which was 156.40 feet higher than its dead level of 1,050 feet. The inflow and outflow of water was recorded 29,800 cusecs and 10,000 cusecs respectively.
The release of water at Kalabagh, Taunsa , Guddu and Sukkur was recorded as 351,600, 234,900, 179,000 and 97,100 cusecs respectively. Similarly, from River Kabul, a total of 84,200 cusecs of water were released at Nowshera and 66,400 cusecs released from River Chenab at Marala.
